description: Try our easy to follow Tabbouleh recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tabbouleh Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lettuce leaves on a serving dish. Spoon portions of tabbouleh into the leaves, scatter the diced tomatoes over the top and serve at room temperature.
